QuestData.Title: Children of Nar'thalas
QuestData.Description: Hi! $n, right? The archmages in Dalaran said we might see you down here.$b$bMy brother and I are here on a reconnaissance mission. We're looking for our parents.$b$bWe've lived our entire lives thinking that our family was killed in Azsuna several thousand years ago, but look around! Most of the elves here are ghosts.$b$bOlothil's been searching through books for clues as to why, but we could use some help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find three Ancient Highborne Tomes in the Ruins of Nar'thalas.
QuestData.CompletionText: We've hit a dead end here. Any luck out there?
QuestData.RewardText: This Prince Farondis opposed Queen Azshara, so she got mad and blew everything up? That's awesome!$b$bHey Olothil, listen to this!
